title: TestCoverageModel
description: The root artifact of a testing layer coverage specification, aggregating all TestCoverageTargets, InputSpacePartitions, ContextVariations, CoverageRequirements, and TestCaseSketches for an application. Corresponds to the test plan document structure in IEEE 829-2008, providing a single point of reference for coverage governance.

application.description: Cross-layer reference ID to the application or API element (application layer or api layer) being covered by this model

source.description: Provenance information indicating the origin of this model (e.g., manually authored, imported from OpenAPI, or generated from source artifacts)
